Interface IEnvironment

    TESTAREnvironment

    Graph environment.
    Author:
    Urko Rueda Molina (alias: urueda)

        action - Executed action, abstracted for graph.
        toState - Graph state after action execution.

      • getWalkedCount

        int[] getWalkedCount(IGraphAction action)
        Gets the walked count for a graph action/edge.
        Parameters:
        action - The graph action.
        Returns:
        [0] = The number of times the state' action was walked in the graph. [1] = The number of times the action type was walked in the graph.

        Returns:

      • getMaxReward

        double getMaxReward(IGraphState gs)
        Gets the max reward for a graph state.
        Parameters:
        gs - The graph state.
        Returns:
        The max reward for each graph action reward from the graph state.

      • getSortedStateActionsByDecReward

        IGraphAction[] getSortedStateActionsByDecReward(IGraphState state)
        Retrieves all the scanned actions for a SUT state by decreased reward.
        Parameters:
        state - The SUT graph state.
        Returns:
        Actions osrted by decreased reward.

      • getSortedActionsByOrder

        IGraphAction[] getSortedActionsByOrder(int fromOrder,
                                       int toOrder)
        Retrieves a list of incrementally ordered actions by their test execution order. Examples: * Full list: fromOder = 1, toOrder = executed_actions_number * Sublist: fromOder = 1 < X < executed_actions_number, toOrder = X < Y < executed_actions_number. * Single element: 1 <= fromOrder = toOrder <= executed_actions_number.
        Parameters:
        fromOrder - Retrieves the list from: 1 .. executed_actions_number.
        toOrder - Retrieves the list to: fromOrder .. executed_actions_number.
        Returns:
        The list of actions.

      • getGraphStateClusters

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> getGraphStateClusters()
        Retrieves graph states grouped by clusters.
        Returns:
        Clusters of related UI states.

      • getGraphActionClusters

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> getGraphActionClusters()
        Retrieves graph actions grouped by clusters.
        Returns:
        Clusters of related UI actions.

      • finishGraph

        void finishGraph(boolean walkStatus,
                 IGraphState lastState,
                 IGraphAction lastAction,
                 org.fruit.alayer.State walkEndState)
        Finish the graph environment with ending test sequence.
        Parameters:
        walkStatus - Test verdict: 'true' test OK, 'false' test FAIL.
        lastState - Last grah state.
        lastAction - Last graph action.
        walkEndState - SUT state after executing last action from the last state.

      • getExplorationCurve

        java.util.List<int[]> getExplorationCurve()
        Retrieves data for the exploration curve.
        Returns:
        [0] unique_states, [1] unique_actions, [2] abstract_states, [3] abstract_actions
